data.title: Boten-Vientiane Railway - Wikipedia
data.meta_description: Boten–Vientiane Railway - Wikipedia - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The Boten–Vientiane railway connects the capital city of Vientiane in Laos to the northern town of Boten on the border with China. It is part of China's Belt and Road Initiative and was officially opened in December 2021. The railway will boost trade and tourism by providing a crucial transport link between Laos and China. Future expansion plans include extending the line into Thailand as part of the Kunming–Singapore railway.
